about_the_game: Composed by our composer Sigurd Jøhnk-Jensen from Iceland, this original soundtrack contains the 8 tracks for Circle Empires Rivals game.  Please consider supporting him by getting this soundtrack.
detailed_description: Composed by our composer Sigurd Jøhnk-Jensen from Iceland, this original soundtrack contains the 8 tracks for Circle Empires Rivals game.  Please consider supporting him by getting this soundtrack.
